content:
High-growth companies are big believers in artificial intelligence

ALL WORKERS must have days when they wonder whether their managers possess any intelligence at all. But next time you are puzzled by a boss’s decision, consider this possibility: the manager relied on artificial intelligence (AI) when considering their options. A survey by Microsoft of 800 business leaders drawn equally from eight countries (France, Germany, Italy, the Netherlands, Russia, Switzerland, the UK and the US) found they are increasingly keen on the idea of AI.

The survey found that 41% of high-growth companies were already implementing AI, as against only 19% of those defined as low growth. There is no proof of causation, of course; the high-growth companies have not necessarily prospered  because they have used AI. The explanation could simply be that high-growth companies have more money to spend on technology and AI is the latest fashion.

Clearly, their experience so far has not discouraged them. Almost all the high-growth companies (93%) intend to invest in AI in the next 1-3 years, and more than half of them expect to use AI to improve their decision-making over the coming year. 

So what are the ways in which managers hope to benefit from AI? Microsoft’s David Carmona points to four areas. The first is based around customers; identifying for example, which customers are likely to “churn”, allowing the company to find ways to keep them on board. A second approach is to use AI to optimise business processes. Third, AI can be used to make hiring decisions. Fourth, managers can use AI to identify new products or areas of expansion. Companies have been using AI already for issues such as quality assurance, predictive maintenance and adding digital assistants to consumer products like cars. Others use “HR bots” to help employees who have questions about their work.

More detailed questions reveal that “motivating and inspiring employees” is the area that managers think might be the single most useful way to invest in AI. So next time your boss pays you a compliment, remember: an algorithm may have made them do it.

网络 荷兰队；荷兰王国；荷蘭
n. 算法；计算程序

adj. 人工的；人造的；假的；人为的
n. 人造肥料；〈美〉假花
网络 矫揉造作的
eg2: an artificial limb/flower/sweetener/fertilizer
假肢；假花；人造甜味剂；化肥
artificial lighting/light
人工照明；人造光
A job interview is a very artificial situation.
求职面试是一个相当不自然的场面。
the artificial barriers of race, class and gender
种族、阶级、性别的人为障碍
artificial emotion
假装的情感

ex: n. 马蝇幼虫，马蝇
n. (Bot)人名；(俄、荷、罗、匈)博特；(法)博

wp.Ropvp bot: 机器人;机器人吸尘器;探测器;早期奥克兰的机器人舞
wp.Warleveling bot: 机器人;战争机器人;战役机器人
wp.Battery Bot: 电池机器人;电池机械人

eg2: Americans are most likely to have encountered bot projects in their cars.
很多美国人可能都在开车时接触到过项目。
One makes toast, while the appropriately attired  at right waits to deliver the toast to a human.
其中一个正在做吐司，而右侧身着女仆装的另一个机器人等着给人送吐司。
The latest victim of the show is Tyler Perry, who is presented as "Funny ," a woman in a dress who tells silly stereotypical jokes that make you laugh over and over again.
在最近一次节目中泰勒·派瑞就以“滑稽马蝇”的形象出现遭到了恶搞，一个盛装打扮总是说着愚蠢的老一套却能让你一次又一次笑翻的笑话的妇女。

ex: n. 原因；因果关系；出现

wp.downward causation: 下向因果性;下向因果关系;向下的因果关系;下向因果
wp.legal causation: 因果关系;法律因果关系

eg2: We think that the only ground of such an inference is .
我们认为那种情况唯一可以推断的便是因果关系。
We should understand  in terms of one thing bashing into another.
我们应该根据某物对另一物体的撞击来理解因果关系。
Our analysis can only identify relationships among variables and in no way implies .
我们的分析只能识别变量之间的关系，决不意味着因果关系。

ex: v. 剧烈搅动；（使）猛烈翻腾；恶心（忧虑、厌恶或恐惧的强烈感觉）
n. （制作黄油的）搅乳器；（旧时）盛奶大罐
网络 搅拌；流失；搅拌器
eg2: The water churned beneath the huge ship.
水在巨轮下面剧烈翻滚。
Vast crowds had churned the field into a sea of mud.
大批大批的人把场地踩得一片泥泞。
My stomach churned as the names were read out.
名单一宣布，我就觉得胃里翻腾得难受。
Conflicting emotions churned inside him.
相互矛盾的情绪使他感到心烦意乱。

wp.Direct Compliment: 直接恭维;直接称赞策略

ex: n. 恭维；称赞；问候；致意；道贺
vt. 恭维；称赞
eg2: them, and show respect.
恭维他们，表现敬意。
If you grew up with harsh criticism and ridicule and impatience, then be sure to , love, and exercise patience with your children.
如果你在苛刻的批评，嘲笑和焦躁下成长，请确保一定要称赞，疼爱并且寻来耐心地对待你的孩子。
Whenever my girlfriend comes back from the salon, I always compliment her hair.
我女友每次从美容院回来，我都会称赞她的头发。

ex: vt. 阻止；使气馁
eg2: Taxation should be used to discourage them.
税收应该用来阻止他们。
But news organizations also should make every effort to keep the discussion civil and to  the dissemination of falsehoods or pejorative attacks on others.
但是，新闻媒体也应尽一切努力来保证讨论以文明的方式进行，并阻止传播谎言或对他人的贬义攻击。

wp.Implement processes: 执行流程;让过程有效;实施过程;实现过程
wp.cleansing implement: 清洗执行;清洗实施;实施清洁
wp.Implement Solution: 推展解决方案;实施方案;实现方案
wp.system implement: 系统实施;系统实现;体系实施;系统的实现
wp.manicure implement: 修指甲用具;修指甲器具

ex: vt. 实施，执行；实现，使生效
n. 工具，器具；手段
eg2: How do we  this?
那我们怎么来执行呢？
How do you implement this practice?
您如何执行这个实践？
Otherwise, you would have to implement this feature yourself.
否则，您就需要自己想办法实现这个特性。

ex: n. 维护，维修；保持；生活费用
eg2: Now all we do is pay , in the form of taxes.
如今我们所要做的只是以纳税的方式支付维修费用。
The  process is not configurable; it starts at midnight every 24 hours.
维护处理是不可配置的，它每隔 24 小时在午夜启动。
Each layer communicates only with the layer immediately above or below it, which facilitates maintenance by isolating problems.
每个层仅与另一层之上或之下直接通信，这样，通过隔离问题简化了维护。

wp.predictive information: 预测性信息;预测信息;预言信息
wp.predictive value: 预测值;预测价值;猜测值
wp.Predictive Dialing: 预测外拨技术;测呼出;预测拨号
wp.predictive maintenance: 预见性维护;预测性维护;预知维护;性保养

ex: adj. 预言性的；成为前兆的
eg2: If models have so little predictive power, what use are they?
既然模型的预测能力如此之小，那它们有什么用呢？
However, even though I recognize the coolness of predictive indexing, my simple function does not bother implementing it.
不过，虽然我认为预定的索引很酷，但这个简单的函数并没有费心去实现它。
" is more predictive than any other of whether you’re willing to have sex on a first date.
的答案比其它"是否愿意在第一次相亲就上床"的问题答案更有预测性。

wp.Sandra Prosper: 桑德拉·普洛斯波;普洛斯波

ex: vi. 繁荣，昌盛；成功
vt. 使……成功；使……昌盛；使……繁荣
n. (Prosper)人名；(英、德、罗、法)普罗斯珀
eg2: May the gods prosper our city!
愿神灵保佑我们的城市繁荣!
May you , may you help preserve and save our planet for your children, and all future children of the world.
希望你们成功，也希望你们保护和拯救我们这个星球，为了你们的孩子，以及未来所有的孩子。

ex: n. 谜；疑问；智力游戏；不解之谜
v. 迷惑；使困惑
网络 拼图；难题；使迷惑
eg2: a crossword puzzle
纵横字谜
a book of puzzles for children
儿童谜语书
What puzzles me is why he left the country without telling anyone.
令我不解的是，他为什么悄悄地离开了这个国家。

ex: vt. 显示；透露；揭露；泄露
n. 揭露；暴露；门侧，窗侧

Title: Welcome to the machine
